verbs.description: You [V: do] n't get a much more Trumpian series of events than this one : Special Counsel Robert Mueller tells President Trump 's legal team what questions he wants Trump to answer ; Trump 's team leaks it to the media ; Trump goes on Twitter to complain about the questions being leaked , amidst a blizzard of other nonsense . When Donald Trump is involved , every new development in this most serious of scandals quickly turns to farce . To be fair , we do n't ...
